name: WooCommerce – Allow Only One Item in Cart
author: Marcus Jaschen

sections.description:
Often it’s required to limit the cart to one item. This plugin achieves this by emptying the cart before
a new item is added.

Requirements

  • PHP 5.6
  • WordPress >= 4.9.0
  • WooCommerce 3.x
sections.installation:
Installing WP Subtitle Support for Better Internal Link Search is just like installing most other plugins.

Check out the codex if you have any questions.

This plugin doesn’t provide any options or settings.

short_description: This WordPress plugin ensures that only one item can be in the WooCommerce cart at any given time.
description:
Often it’s required to limit the cart to one item. This plugin achieves this by emptying the cart before
a new item is added.

Requirements

  • PHP 5.6
  • WordPress >= 4.9.0
  • WooCommerce 3.x
